metadata.title: Besilver Triple Heart Necklace for Women Girls Antler/Butterfly/Crystal Iced Out Love Heart Jewelry Gifts for Christmas Day/Valentine Day/Birthday
features: ❤ Genuine 925 sterling silver necklace.100% safe for sensitive skin. Strict health standards guarantee your daily wearing. Besilver's products are tarnish-free, nickel-free, lead-free, and cadmium-free, which is not harmful to your health. Tarnish resistant and will not easily change color.

❤ Dainty but heavy....this necklace truly represents love, family and eternal connection between people. Three connected hearts that represent infinity and represent Grandmother, Mom, and Child...Father, Mother and Child...or three sisters or best friends! Three Heart Necklace. Perfect holiday Gift.

❤ Honor the bonds of family and friendship with this triple hearts Necklace. Giving such a cutest necklace is a beautiful way to tell your beloved families and friends how you feel about her. This necklace will be of fine enough quality to last as long as your love for her.

❤ Packed in a velvet pouch and beautiful gift box for gifting (or of course...to keep for yourself). A special gift for her as Birthday gift, Graduation gift, Christmas gift, Anniversary gift, Valentines Day gift, Mothers Day gift or other special day gifts.

❤ Guarantee : 100% satisfaction and money back guarantee , any question just feel free to contact us . Besilver Jewelry update new products every month regularly, we values each customer and endeavour to offer an excellent service during the purchase.
description: Express Your Love with This Love Heart Necklace

♥A simple but meaningful Love Heart necklace make a great valentines or anniversary gift for her. Express your love with this love heart necklace. Giving such a meaningful necklace is a beautiful way to tell her how you feel about her. This necklace will be of fine enough quality to last as long as your love for her. .

♥Material:High Quality Solid Sterling Silver 925 (tarnish-free, nickel-free, lead-free, and cadmium-free. 100% safe for sensitive skin).  ♥Top quality Cubic zirconia are sparkling and reflect rainbow gloss in the sunshine just like a real diamond.   ♥GIFT BOX: Come up with a velvet pouch and beautiful gift box for gifting (or of course...to keep for yourself).  ♥This beautiful necklace match with suitable apparel for different occasion such as party,anniversary,birthday,Christmas,Mothers day or everyday wear... !

Besilver Jewelry have been in the silver jewelry since 2008 and is renowned by being passionate,creative of timeless jewelry.  We Offer jewelry design,manufacture and online retailing. Our extensive line of timeless pieces encompasses classic and fashion-forward designs, perfect for every unforgettable moment. We pride ourselves in each and every piece of jewelry we make. You can enjoy great customer service and enjoy fun of jewelry without worries. New fashion designs are updated regularly every month. We welcome you to Besilver Jewelry!

1.Keep silver jewelry clean and dry. Silver jewelry should be placed in a sealed dry place when not in use. 2.Better not wearing it while bathing 3.Away from chemical, such as perfume. Best to wear perfume before wearing jewelry. 4.Regularly wipe the surface with a polishing cloth 5.Avoid the sun to be basked in straight.
